text: wkdhlk yueta min almal aldhy afa'h allah ealaa rasulih alfuqara' almhajrwn, aladhin adtrhm kafaar "mk" 'iilaa alkhuruj min diarihim wa'amwalihim yatlubun min allah 'an yatafadal ealayhim balrzq fi aldunya walrdwan fi alakhrt, wayansurun din allah warasulih baljhad fi sabil allh, 'uwlayik hum alsaadiqun aladhin sddaqu qawlihim bfelhm
